title: State Capitol Report: State Budget Preview And Walker's Presidential Ambitions
teaser: Gov. Scott Walker will deliver his 2015-17 budget address to the state Legislature Tuesday evening. In the State Capitol Report, Joy Cardin and WPR’s state government reporter Shawn Johnson go over the major details of the plan, including funding for the University of Wisconsin System and an arena for the Milwaukee Bucks. Plus, they discuss the latest in Walker’s possible presidential campaign.
